story:
It's laid back, affordable, it's good food and good people. Here goes the story.

Fabrika Coworking Space

What?

Fabrika will be the first coworking space in the city of Sombor, Serbia. We are raising funds to open it. Our founder team is Serge Bajic, an MBA graduate & ecommerce consultant, and Tanja, a graduate of Dutch language and literature.

The 105sqm (1130sqf) space is located in the centre of Sombor, a 700 year old city in northern Serbia. It was started by two local nomads, Serge and Tanja. Their resolve came from the love for their city, its heritage, culture, and desire to reestablish it as a regional center for innovation, creativity and social progress. It is a social enterprise which will invest all its profits in local teams delivering projects of great social value - from music festivals to human rights

"From the first time I heard about this project, I was excited. It had all the right elements: a strong social slant to the business; a cool team behind it and an unwavering commitment by the team to build the project up one community member at a time! I know first hand the transformative power an innovation space can have on a small creative town and am really excited to see it be."- Steve Munroe, Hubud, Contributed $100


Why?

Apart from the obvious need for a coworking space, Serge and Tanja are strongly driven to see Sombor thrive and prosper. Our city was once a regional center of culture, art, and independent thought. But as the industrial market shifted to technology and services, economy of the Balkan region suffered, and a lot of people moved out of Sombor, looking for fortunes in bigger cities. This trend needs to be stopped. With recent emergence of location independent lifestyle, we recognized that we have an opportunity to steer the city back on track, by providing services and infrastructure for digital nomads. Our members will be making impact by simply working from Fabrika.

"My favorite thing about the coworking movement is that it's happening all over the world in so many different ways. It just speaks to the fact that no matter what language, culture or ethnicity, there is a human instinct to share space and ideas; and a growing desire to do so. The ability to contribute and participate in a community is what makes us better dreamers, thinkers and doers." - Mike LaRosa, Coworkoholic, Contributed $250

"What I love about Fabrika is that it’s all about bringing the community together and celebrating the town they are proud to be part of - and coworking spaces are a perfect platform for that. I look forward to seeing Sombor thrive through this initiative, supported by a great team with business sustainability and the heart of community in mind."- Stephanie Arrowsmith, Vennture, Contributed $100

Wait, where again is it… ?

Most of you will think that Sombor, Serbia is in Russia. Sorry to disappoint. It’s this whole other place, roughly between Greece and Hungary. Vienna, Austria, is 5 hours away by car, and you can reach Budapest in just under 3. The city is a home to 50,000 people, a sits next to Danube river, on the tristate border of Serbia, Hungary, and Croatia.

Photo by Ispánovics József

Who can I expect to meet there?

We are just bootstrapping our community, but from what it seems, you will be working among freelance designers, developers, journalists and architects. So, you probably shouldn’t expect to find funding for your next startup project here, but you should expect skill building events and workshops across various interesting disciplines. Not to mention you will get to interact with local teams doing projects that are shaking up this sleepy town and turning it upside down – they will be using the same coworking space as you!

Ok, so, IF I decide to come live and work in Sombor, how would that look like?

First things first – getting shit done

ISP contract packages in Sombor start at 30Mbps and go up to 150Mbps. All decent cafes and restaurants offer stable WiFi, but if you find yourself needing more, Sombor is covered by HSPA+ (3G) mobile signal, and 1GB of data costs $4 with one of the local operators.

When I’m in town, I do my work at a local bar with very comfy sofas (lap-top). Apart from that, there are few other couch-style bars, and a number of standard cafes with chairs and desks.

Cafe De Sol, canal-side property popular during warm part of the year

Community and vibe

Sitting on a border of Serbia, Hungary and Croatia, and historically being a part of four kingdoms and two republics, diversity is a part of Sombor’s DNA. As it often happens with cosmopolitan places, art and bohemian lifestyle quickly grew roots. Its people long defied hectic tempo of the modern world, taking their time to do everything – even speak. If you ask someone from Belgrade about their experience with Sombor, one of the first things you’ll hear is that Somborians take ages to finish a sentence.

"Here, time isn't treated like a scarce resource, but an honourable gift to the guest and a code of duty for the host. Our experience in the Balkans will forever serves as a counterpoint to the modern city culture of achievement and competitiveness." - Charine Tan, Singapore


Coming to Sombor, you will become a part of community that doesn’t want to spend their days chasing riches, but enjoys simple pleasures of life instead. Intrigued by foreigners, Somborians will quickly draw you into their lifestyle of coffees all day, late evening hangouts, and obligatory breakaways to nearby weekend settlements for all day beer and bbq.

Cost of living

There’s no other way to say it- Sombor is shamelessly cheap. Self-catering 1-bedroom apartment in city center will cost you USD 250 a month, and if you prefer shorter stay, AirBnB listings average at $35 for one night, with longer stay discounts available. According to Numbeo, USD 1500 in Sombor equals $3500 in Berlin, $4000 in Toronto, and $4800 in Philadelphia. Melbourne? Don’t even get us started on that. And guess what - it’s even cheaper than famous Chiang Mai!

Safety

Let’s address the elephant in the room first – no, there’s no war in Serbia, and there hasn’t been one for 17 years. The country is now on its path to joining EU and is in debt and ruled by IMF like all other proper democracies out there. UK government says that “most visits to Serbia are trouble-free”, and Numbeo Safety Index says Serbia is roughly as safe as Australia and Sweden. Sombor, being a rather small place, rarely experiences crime other than petty thefts. Common sense does apply however, so, lock your bike and don’t walk through dark streets alone in 2am, and you should be fine.

"The hospitality and kindness from Serbian people 
is the sort that you heard about fifty years ago. Leave your misconceptions at home and embrace the warmth here." - Matthew Horkey, USA



Daily activities & infrastructure

This is where things get really fun. Despite being a laid-back place, Sombor’s got you covered on your daily chores. Supermarkets are abundant with local and imported goods, daily farmer’s market will fill your need for groceries, and bicycle is the most popular method of getting around. If it starts to rain – a metered taxi will get you to the edge of the city and back for as little as $3. For the sportsy ones out there, there’s a total of three gyms in the city, more than 10 tennis fields and countless street basketball courts. You can decide to do your morning jogging on the city’s own racetrack, or simply stretch at the local yoga studio. Need someone to clean up the place while you’re out? Maids start at $2 an hour.

Unique things to do

Given its unique geo-political location, Sombor area developed its own culture and traditions. We’re talking folklore dances, traditional handcrafts, canal fishing, farm dining and accommodation, local cuisine workshops, biking tours, eating smoked trout on a canalside restaurant while enjoying local lute players. All the stuff is there, it’s what you make of it.

Grandpa-Hornjak farm offers traditional dining just outside of Sombor

Nature and weather

Sombor prides itself in being “the greenest city” in Serbia. The whole place looks like it’s in a middle of a big park. Honestly – click here for an aerial view of the place. But in case you need to get away from roads, cars and people, only 20km away is a big nature reserve called “Upper Danube”, hosting intersecting canals, ponds and forests, and incredible biodiversity reflected in 230 species of birds and 51 species of mammals. The reserve is surrounded by traditional villages, where you can still experience life as it was 100 years ago.

Photo by Ispánovics József

As for weather, Serbia has continental climate, which means four distinct seasons. Things start to blossom in early March, and April and May are buzzing with life. Starting in June, temperatures go above 30 degs, and stay like that until mid September, when Autumn creeps in, in all its golden glory. November is when Serbia’s own digital nomads start migrating to Asia, apart those few fond of rain and cold winds. December usually brings the first snow, which marks the beginning of winter. Photo by Bitbox

But how do I … ?

Don’t worry, we got you covered. As fellow travellers, we understand what it means to find yourself in a new, exotic place where you can’t tell heads or tails. Whatever you need, be that help with finding a cheap place to stay, a dentist, a new pair of socks, or just someone to talk to after a busy day, we’re here for you. And that's a promise.

Fabrika founders - Serge and Tanja

Finally, where will the money go?

All of the funds will be used to furnish the coworking space and ensure pleasant and productive working environment for our community. You can download detailed budget spreadsheet here. 

That's it folks! If what we wrote resonates, click here to go to the top and choose one of the cool things on the right!

Partners

Everyone who contributes gets a $25 voucher to redeem in one of our partner spaces. Voucher comes with a minimum spend of $125, or can be applied to unlimited monthly membership at the space (whichever comes first).

Bangkok, Thailand Belgrade, Serbia Budapest, Hungary Chiang Mai, Thailand
Girona, Spain Jakarta, Indonesia Ko Lanta, Thailand Mokrin, Serbia
Singapore Ubud, Bali Zagreb, Croatia

story:
-The Future of Honey is Here-

If you're here that means you probably love honey, same as we do. However putting honey in your drinks could get very messy, or even annoying sometimes. That's why most people use other sweeteners for their drinks, rather than honey. Our goal is to make honey more convienent for the everyday use, that's the main reason we invented Globee. 



What is Globee?

Globee is the world's first artisan honey sphere, coated with a thin gelatin layer, created to sweeten your drinks, and also to make life a little easier.

Our Mission

Did you ever get sticky, and everything messy around you after using honey to sweeten your drinks? We know how frustrating this can be, that's why our team reimagined the honey sweetener experience.

We are raising 50,000$ to bring Globee to life. We think it's an awesome, innovative product, and we stand behind it 100%! Your support will allow us to initiate tooling, and manufacturing, so we can make Globee available to you!

This unique design was inspired by nature, we have spent several months to create the finest holding case for our honey spheres and we got it... It looks just like a honeycomb structure!

Worker bees seal their comb cells for protecting honey with wax, to prevent absorption of moisture from the air.

We are using the same principle, but with different materials.

In order to ensure the quality of the nineteen honey spheres, we cover their capsules with a golden alu foil. That way to protect them from harmful external effects like; light, sunray, air, and humidity.


Why use Globee? 

  • No more stickiness.
  • Quick to use.
  • Rich honey taste.

  • Healthier than other sweeteners.
  • Each capsule is also easy to separate.

It's ideal for every home kitchen, or if you're on the go, just grab a few capsules and take them with you!


Globee Fits Into Your Coffee Capsule Holders!




Easy to Use

story:
Tolani Lawrence-Lightfoot & David Hatch , a self-taught floral design team, stylists, fabricators, graphic designers and high school sweet hearts of 18 years. Their backgrounds are both in the Fine Arts. Tolani and David have an enlightened awareness of beauty and a passion for creating captivating floral experiences. Snapdragon Flowers embraces an urban, postmodern-pastoral philosophy. We have spent years tirelessly educating ourselves about and seeking alluring,graceful,fascinating, elegant and unusual botanicals. Snapdragon Flowers believes this world needs a floral revolution. Our approach to florals is one where aesthetic meets the science and art of botany. Snapdragon believes that everyone needs flowers in their life and often.  In order to do this right we are in need of some extra funding. With family far away we simply do not have the support we need to meet the expense of life and our business. We hope together we can grow this floral oasis. Philadelphia needs a truly "alternative florist". One run by fine artists.

As of now we re looking to raise $10,000. This will be used on our rent, some renovations, security, POS system, and a van. Ours is very unsafe and unreliable. A good used van could boost business for us. Maintaining our childcare situation is also very important. Our family needs to be able to rely on the familiar face that has helped us along the way. Knowing our children are happy and safe while we all adjust to working out of the house is key. We are using this money also as a buffer seeing as though the first year is the hardest. 
We are offering wonderful perks. If we do not reach the set goal we will still use our funds with deep thankfulness and gratitude. Any amount of money or time is deeply appreciated. And if you leave a address we will thank all in some special way.
story_txt: Tolani Lawrence-Lightfoot & David Hatch , a self-taught floral design team, stylists, fabricators, graphic designers and high school sweet hearts of 18 years. Their backgrounds are both in the Fine Arts. Tolani and David have an enlightened awareness of beauty and a passion for creating captivating floral experiences. Snapdragon Flowers embraces an urban, postmodern-pastoral philosophy. We have spent years tirelessly educating ourselves about and seeking alluring,graceful,fascinating, elegant and unusual botanicals. Snapdragon Flowers believes this world needs a floral revolution. Our approach to florals is one where aesthetic meets the science and art of botany. Snapdragon believes that everyone needs flowers in their life and often.  In order to do this right we are in need of some extra funding. With family far away we simply do not have the support we need to meet the expense of life and our business. We hope together we can grow this floral oasis. Philadelphia needs a truly "alternative florist". One run by fine artists.As of now we re looking to raise $10,000. This will be used on our rent, some renovations, security, POS system, and a van. Ours is very unsafe and unreliable. A good used van could boost business for us. Maintaining our childcare situation is also very important. Our family needs to be able to rely on the familiar face that has helped us along the way. Knowing our children are happy and safe while we all adjust to working out of the house is key. We are using this money also as a buffer seeing as though the first year is the hardest. We are offering wonderful perks. If we do not reach the set goal we will still use our funds with deep thankfulness and gratitude. Any amount of money or time is deeply appreciated. And if you leave a address we will thank all in some special way.

story:
Stephan Lippold is an old-school Ossi, i.e. Ost-Deutscher - East German).

We've set up this campaign to help this particular Ossi with his plan, to start a business in the UK called 'Ask the Ossi!', offering the normal on-site solutions like building repairs, but also with an 'Ask the Ossi!' online presence, spreading the legendary Ossi ingenuity and creativity to make life easier. 

It can be rightly said of the Ossis that they have done so much with so little for so long, that they can now do anything with nothing. This may be a small exaggeration - nothing happens without money either, and this obstacle is as insurmountable as the Berlin Wall. 

The South African economy is so bad now, that he needs to move where the work is. So in typical Ossi fashion, after four large projects appeared and then disappeared in the space of six months, he woke up with a plan: to crowdfund his trip to England.
 
What He Needs & What You Get

Here are the funds and their allocation:
~ the price of a ticket for the Ossi to the UK:                                               $ 450
~ a small used car/van for him to get to his various jobs                   $  1  250
~ tools                                                                                                                   $      500
~ living expenses (rent, electricity, internet) for two months           $  1  500

Planned gifts and tokens of appreciation - see Perks.

  • Where the funds go if we don't reach our goal:
    The main purpose of this funding is to get Stephan to the UK. The priority is the ticket. 

    Next on the list:
    a small, used van/car + tools and living expenses for the first month. The more lucrative jobs want drivers/handymen to have their own cars/tools.

The Impact

It is not sustainable for us to carry on living in South Africa with no work and we are reluctant to get into debt. We would see work in the UK as a  permanent solution to our problems.

Risks & Challenges

Since construction work is more plentiful in the UK than in South Africa, it's a no-brainer to go where the work is.

The language problem is a slight issue, and Stephan is enthusiastically improving his English with daily online lessons.

Competition for work: while the work is more plentiful, the competition is also greater. But the Ossi's experience and qualifications will be an big advantage, difficult as the initial transition will be.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • So often one would like to help but financially but even a small amount is impossible. Please be assured, sharing IS caring in a huge way! We'd greatly appreciate your spreading the word, via Facebook or email or at your next braai/barbie.

  • There are sharing tools on Indigogo which you are most welcome to use too.

story:
Our Story

It started with an idea. Wouldn't it be cool to start something that mattered?  The idea we have been working on is a Tie of the Month Club.  After lots of research and a couple trips abroad we have come up with a great plan and hope you will agree. 

Instead of sourcing the ties from established manufacturers overseas, we decided to do something different.  In January we started our own facility in Bacolod, Philippines.  We hired over 20 employees with experience levels from beginners to previous shop owners.  We then brought in trainers to teach them how to produce the highest quality ties possible. 

Our Model

In keeping with our goal of starting something that matters we decided to go with a model that could accomplish just that.  Similar to many other successful startups that came before us we wanted to be socially responsible. 

The first thing we do is use 10% of all revenue(not just profit) for local health and education projects in the community where we manufacture our ties.  In addition we will donate 20% of revenue to different chartiteable organizations.  For the Indiegogo campaign, backers will be able to choose from a list of causes they want the contribution from their purchase to go towards.

Another focus is our TFC family. We strive to create a productive and fun atmosphere at our facility. Many of our workers even help with our events we host for local children. At the time of our campaign we have provided over 1700 meals for local children in need.

In order to lessen our environmental impact, we source local recycled materials for our packaging.

Our Product

We think we have created a very unique product. Each tie is hand made and signed on the back by the skillful seamstress who made it. Also included will be a set of color coordinated cuff links and matching handkerchief. All of this for only $25 for one time purchases or $20 per month for Tie of the Month Club members.  You can presently review our website www.tiesforchange.com to see many of our current prototypes. At the end of the campaign you will be able to choose which style and color you would prefer for your set.  

The Charities

At the end of the campaign we will contact each backer to see which cause they would like to support. You will be able to choose from: Global Health, Cancer Research, Global Education, Alzheimer's Research and Children's Hospitals. Going forward you will be able to visit www.tiesforchange.com and vote from a list of charitable organizations each month.  The selected charity will receive 20% of all revenue from all products sold that month. 


We reserve the right to replace your choice with a material of similar color and design based on material availability. The pictures all show black cuff links included. That is for photos only as we will order the coordinated cuff links once we have the final materials. 

We have done our homework. We have great people already in place and strongly believe there are no obstacles we cannot overcome with collaboration and the right attitude.

story:
Short Summary

The cage fish farming small business will operate as a business of excellence as it will encourage responsible aquaculture in which all aspects of Best Management Practices BMP will be observed.  As an emerging entrepreneur I have accumulated vast knowledge in fish farm management over the past 10 years. This campaign for funds will allow me realize my dream of establishing a   small but vibrant company that will   act as a center fro youth empowerment through employment and skills transfer, 

What We Need & What You Get

The cage fish farming is asking for startup capital in order for it to commerce its operations. The funds raised will go towards fabrication of the cage and the nets, purchase of the fishing craft (banana boat) and take care of the first running cost of the business i.e. fish seed, fish feeds and pay for labor.

The Impact

The project will impact positively on youth empowerment in the aquaculture industry in Zambia as it will be an area were youths shall be offered opportunities to develop their skills and competences through an internship program. Through my work as an Aquaculturist have developed a following and moderate on face book page Aquaculture Technicians Zambia. This will be a chance to actualize the discussions and they by transfer skills.

Risks & Challenges

As a small business they are various risks and challenges we are bound to face i.e.

Feeds supply and Fish seed supply

Accesses to quality fish seed and fish feed might present itself as a problem in Siavonga however its delighting to not that  I am an expert in feed formulation and production by use of a computer based software winfeed TM.

It’s very possible to source fish seed from hatcheries outside Siavonga i.e. Chilanga and Palabana in Lusaka. I have good working relations with the two hatcheries.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know you know someone who is passionate at helping out in this venture please feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools

Thank you

story:
Recruiting Done Right

Over the last nine years I've seen countless high potential, hard-working candidates miss out on excellent opportunities to work for great companies. Many highly sought-after, very capable candidates were disqualified for something small. The hiring process took too long and candidates lost interest. Improper expectations were set for the open positions. Employee engagement crashed and turnover ran rampant. The resulting losses and employee replacement costs were staggering.

You or someone you care about has experienced this.

Cope Career Services was started to fix a glaring problem: great people do not always get the best jobs. One misstep easily costs them the opportunity. Most of the time, the applicant never even learns what they could have improved. So, they just continue to apply and interview until they find a company willing to hire them, often settling for the first position they can get, where they will be less likely to be an engaged employee.

Corporations tend to use automated systems that disqualify large numbers of candidates who do not have the right keywords in their resume. They use generic assessments and a strict grading matrix for interviews. The personal touch and human element are essentially removed from the process. If your company is doing this, you're missing out on great candidates.

That's where we come in. Check out:

Cope Career Services Recruiting

story:
We are 4 Fuquans who want to meet more students and professionals like us. 

We're second year MBA students with a variety of backgrounds from tech startups, media, accounting, and B2B marketing. This campaign will help us get our app idea developed - it's an app we're passionate about because as young professionals starting our careers, WE want to use it and build a network with it!
By donating to our campaing, you will help us build the funds to hire developers to build the first prototype for launch as well as deliver initial funds for launch marketing.

Out of Towner - How it Works
You're traveling for work for a few days and you spend about 5 hours in transit at airports and several more in your hotel room between meetings. You might have a meal or two with clients but sometimes you are left to your own devices. Imagine maximizing the time you have at an airport or at a city to meet and network with alumni from your school or professionals in the same industry! Out of Towner is designed for the young professional who wants to make the most out of their business travel. 

What We Need & What You Get
We need about $10,000 in funding for both the initial app development as well as the launch funds needed for paid search and paid social media.
If we don't reach our full goal, we will utilize what we have to get a prototype developed.

The Impact: We WILL Launch
With prior experience in app development and launch, we WILL launch this app if we recieve adequate funding. 
We're currently shopping around for tech developers and will begin production as soon as we reach a threshold funding of $5,000!

Risks & Challenges

Two primary challenges face us: 

1. We do not want to be another dating app - there are too many of those in the world already! We are focused on young professionals meeting other like-minded people and maximizing the time they have when they are traveling. This will be reflected in the matching algorithms and the information needed from each new user.

2. There is somewhat of a network affect that will be difficult to overcome. That's where the extra budgeted $5,000 comes in handy! We'll be doing major geo-targeted promotions within big cities high-travel density airports to ensure that we build up a network fast!

Other Ways You Can Help
Share our campaign and spread the word about the new Out of Towner app!



y can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
As people know, Basingstoke has gone long enough without a dedicated comic, collectable and card game shop located in the town centre. I have been researching every detail, looked at every empty unit and talked to as many distributors as I can. 

There's been alot of public backing, both from friends and complete strangers, and I plan on stocking everything that people have asked for, which includes;

  1. DC comics, Dark Horse and Marvel comics, 
  2. Pop Vinyls
  3. Action figures 
  4. Lego (Star Wars, DC, Marvel, Many more)
  5. Pokemon, MTG and Yugioh cards and accessories
  6. Regular events (Not stock, but needs to go somewhere)

However, as I was unable to acquire a large enough sum of money from the bank, i'm turning to the local people for help! Every penny donated will be paid back, and you will also receive bonus incentives.

The building i've found has two floors, so if we receive enough backing, we'll have a huge shop floor as well as a seating area upstairs with enough room for 40-50 people events and tournaments.

As mentioned above, all money put into the store will be paid back. This will be done in one of two ways. You can either receive 30% (40% in year 4) of your initial investment paid back each year for four years, for a total of 130%, or receive 120% at the end of our third year, starting from the day we open our doors.

Thanks for any help you can provide.

CJ

story:
"We believe luxury should be affordable and eco-conscious. Help Harvey Prince disrupt the beauty industry with our monthly Story of Perfume subscription box! Join us as we take on overpriced, generic department store fragrances. Together, we'll create luxury cruelty-free, vegan, and safe beauty products that are affordable to all people! "

What is The Story of Perfume?

Tired of the same-old, generic fragrances at department stores? Hate being accosted by aggressive salespeople at the perfume counter? Want to give your nose a much-needed break?

Welcome to The Story of Perfume by Harvey Prince! Take your senses on an exotic, fragrant adventure every month with a little help from Harvey Prince and The Story of Perfume, a brand new monthly beauty box subscription! 

No more malls! No more fighting for parking spots! No more perfume-induced headaches! Enjoy luxury fragrances and beauty products for women from the comfort of your home with The Story of Perfume, delivered directly to you each month!

Each month, subscribers receive an elegant box filled with luxurious Harvey Prince products that have been crafted from the finest ingredients and best essential oils in the world. Our boxes contain: 

  • Two private blend mini roller fragrances (valued at $60)
  • Two samples from our Harvey Prince line of fragrances 
  • Two samples from our Harvey Prince bath, body and hair lines 

Subscribers can rest assured knowing that every product is 100% cruelty free, vegan and gluten free.


Our January box took subscribers’ senses to the romantic streets of Italy. Each product within this box was reminiscent of Italian culture and infused with Italian passion!

In February, subscribers had the opportunity to experience the mystical country of India through a unique mixture of Harvey Prince products crafted to reflect exotic Indian spices.

Subscribers were whisked away to France with our March box, where our fragrances and other beauty products were as awe-inspiring and chic as the City of Lights itself!

Where will The Story of Perfume take subscribers next? It’s always a mystery, giving subscribers one more reason to keep coming back for more!



Beauty Blogger Testimonials






The Harvey Prince Story

Harvey Prince was founded in 2007 on the desire to revolutionize the beauty industry by creating high quality, eco-conscious fragrances and body products that are completely cruelty free, vegan, and safe to use for pregnant mamas—all while leaving your wallets full!

It Began With a Rebellious Idea:

Harvey Prince was founded by two brothers who sought to create the perfect perfume as a Mother’s Day gift for their inspirational mother. In doing so, they realized something incredible: boutique-quality scents should not be overpriced, intimidating, and filled with toxic chemicals. The brothers crafted a fragrance that captured her effortless beauty and radiant aura. The result: Ageless, the first of our signature fragrances to disrupt the industry’s usual cosmetics-counter fare.

In 2015, Harvey Prince was reborn as Harvey Prince Organics, recommitted to creating the best cruelty free, vegan, and gluten free fragrances and body products.  We currently sell nearly 30 different fragrances in our online store and are continually expanding our bath, hair, and body lines, with our latest Keravegan Hair Masque and Original Fango Mud Therapy.

By bringing honest, pure products directly to you on our website and eliminating overpriced middlemen such as department stores and duty free shops with huge markups, we obtain the best essential oils and finest natural ingredients from all over the world, providing superior quality luxury products to our customers at a fraction of the price. We proudly design and craft all of our products in the U.S.A.

FAQs

Where will The Story of Perfume ship?

We ship our subscription boxes all around the world.

What will be in each month’s box?

Each box contains two private blend mini roller fragrances exclusive to subscribers of The Story of Perfume. In addition to these mini rollers, The Story of Perfume also contains two samples of our most popular perfumes for women, as well as two samples from our best-selling line of bath, body and hair products.

How much does The Story of Perfume cost?

The Story of Perfume is $22 per month when you purchase a one-, three-, or six- month subscription. When you purchase a year-long subscription at $220, it’s the equivalent of getting 2 months of boxes free! 

What is the total value of the products in The Story of Perfume?

With two exclusive 7ml mini roller fragrances valued at $30 each, plus two 15-30ml samples from our best-selling bath, hair and body line, AND two 2ml samples of our most popular perfumes for women, each box contains approximately $70 worth of products for only $22 monthly!   

Is there any cost to sign up?

No! There is no cost to sign up, and users can order one month at a time instead of opting in for a longer subscription. That way, you can stop receiving The Story of Perfume boxes whenever you’d like, so there’s no obligation!

How is The Story of Perfume different from other subscription boxes?

Unlike many other subscription beauty boxes, our products are 100% cruelty free, vegan and gluten free. Every Harvey Prince product is made in the USA with the finest natural ingredients and best essential oils. We also offer higher valued products in our boxes, since each month’s box contains two full-sized mini roller fragrances. 

Risks/Challenges

Wearing perfume is perhaps one of the most intimate and personal products a woman will apply on her body. A customer may wonder to herself, how can I be sure I’ll like a fragrance if I’ve never smelled it before? 

Whether you consider yourself a perfumista or a novice to the fragrance world, each Story of Perfume box allows you to try at a minimum four different fragrances every month: two private blend, generously sized mini rollers and two samples of our most popular perfumes. All categories of perfume notes are typically covered in each Harvey Prince fragrance for complete olfactory bliss! From citrus to florals, gourmand to wood notes, and many, many more, you’re virtually guaranteed to find a Harvey Prince fragrance that strikes your fancy and becomes your signature scent with The Story of Perfume box. The Story of Perfume box not only gives you diverse luxury fragrance options each month, it also is more affordable and less risky than buying a single perfume from a mass retailer online without having smelled it first! 

How Can You Help?

We understand that not everyone will be able to make a financial contribution to The Story of Perfume, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help! Share our story on social media and get the word out about the new subscription beauty box that’s changing the fragrance industry, one sweet spritz at a time!

Thank You!

Thank you for taking the time to read about The Story of Perfume! We hope that you are as excited about this fragrant journey around the world as we are. If you have any questions, or would like to know more about Harvey Prince and The Story of Perfume, email us at help@harveyprince.com!

story:
Not For Me But For Her.


Hello! I am Chona Fernandez, a full-time housewife and mother of three kids.


I am raising funds for my younger sister Sheila Catudio, solo parent with a 7-year old son, both survivors of the super typhoon Haiyan/ Yolanda in November 2013. Sheila did not qualify for free housing launched by the government so she rents a small room in Tacloban City. Although she has skills in sewing, cooking, and gardening, her present situation hinders her in finding a decent calling. She just depends on selling items on season or paid errands from friends and relatives. I really wanted to help her but since I am also jobless, I cannot extend much financial support. 

So I reached out to you because if we can supply her the tools  to start with something she knows and enjoys, then we can help her provide their daily sustenance through hard work, not by dependency  from aids, donations, or whatever.


What We Need & What You Get


For a total of US$ 1,000.00, we are going to purchase:

  A brand new sewing machine-

  •             

                                                  US$ 615.00

                                                                                                                            Tools

                 

                 US$  25.00

 Materials                         
                                                                              US$ 100.00

               Freight and Door-to-door Delivery  from Manila to Tacloban City
                                                                             US$ 150.00

                                                            

Other Items  - US$ 110.00. (For purchase of perks)
For your contribution, we offer our warmest gratitude and a little token to be delivered after the campaign. It will always come with:

                                   


And if we would not reach our entire goal, my sister could start with dealership on personal care products or mobile phone loading. Still, you receive the perks corresponding to the amount.

When is life meaningful?


                               

How do you feel if you are able to share something from your hard-earned money, to help someone that you don't even know? Do you feel strange? Is it a strange feeling you can not simply explain yet fulfilling... satisfying which makes you a ...greater person? Because you heed the cry of the less fortunate and you are more blessed despite facing some problems in your daily routine? 
Sharing your blessings bear more blessings. Through this act, your existence become more meaningful. You exist not only for you, but for others as well. Who knows, the ones you have supported now may however reciprocate generosity to others, in time. 

My Experience On Charity Works
My very first was a Zumba Halloween Party, for the benefit of our high school Dance Sport representatives. They need a certain amount for the dancing shoes. I was able to solicit from several of our batch mates who are well-off, sell tickets from other alumni and Zumba enthusiasts, gather gift vouchers from friends.
                 https://www.facebook.com/events/1514177838898463/
That was last October 2015. And since then, I was transformed. Because I was just living inside my "cocoon" before. My life simply evolves for my husband and kids, in spite  awareness  that the Yolanda survivors (my siblings and their families included) have not yet regained what they lost. It was last October 2015 when I realized that if I can persuade people to support my cause, then I should do it more often to help my "kababayans" in Tacloban City. But I have to start with my siblings as the saying goes: charity begins at home. And for this campaign, I am donating US$ 10.00 .

                                   A Surprise.

                              


What better way to give than a surprise! I could not just tell my sister that I am running a campaign for her. But once the fund reaches 25% of the goal, I will let her know.


Other Ways You Can Help

Don't despair if you can not contribute money. You may inform your circle of friends and relatives about us.

You will be our advertiser, and for that, A MILLION THANKS TOO!

story:
EVERYONE NEEDS A LITTLe HUMOR IN THEIR LIVES


The most simple people  the most important ones alike share that same thing in common _ HUMOR.  We all enjoy a little comical relief.   It is truly a sense which unites all of US. 

In Ancient Greece, Satire reflected the lay person's understanding of the political process.  And this idea of being equals; specialists and novices ( Satires ) alike  revolving around the same issues, has endured in the culture ever since. 

Sometimes, even Social Landscape can appear surreal, and we are confronted with truly Hilarious situations.  Of course, Even if not everything is a laughing matter, Hopefully, we can learn to see the Humor in everything.

 

Feel the BERN  : )

I am wishing to start my own TeeShirt company.  I am asking for donations to launch my first design.  I am passionate about my project and am searching to raise $4,000 to begin, selling and distributing this model.

  • I will use every Dollar I raise to provide quality shirts to customers nationwide
  • I will source and produce my shirts in the USA
  • I will offer Unisex shirts in different sizes _ S, M, L, XL( In Red and White)

 AND, I am looking to offer a greater variety of shirts in the future, such as women’s as well as tall cuts.

I will be Opening a Internet Store, which will offer other models as well as Custom designs and MORE Humoristic Logos.   & hope you’ll have a chance to follow the Store’s development ;D

I HOPE TO HEAR FROM YOU SOON ;)

Also, if you’ve donated more than $8 you will receive a free TeeShirt 

You Can Also follow the Progress of my Campaign and contact me on TWITTER :   @PSofCHICtees

If you can’t donate, NO NEED TO FEEL LEFT OUt _ You can participate by letting you friends know about my campaign, by forwarding it to them over the TWITTER or FACEBOOK

And you Can send me messages on TWITTER @PSofCHICtees

THANK YOU ;*

story:
What is OneClick?

OneClick will be a unique Tech Package of digital sales and marketing tools.

For the tech savvy, imagine WIX, Hootsuite, MailChimp, Google Analytics, Shopify and Goodbarber all rolled into one product, and then some - this is what OneClick will do.  

Saving you a huge amount of time and money and letting you focus on what you would rather be doing.

Maritza really nails it.


For the not so tech savvy, the OneClick package will give you easy control of all your digital sales and marketing:

  • One click publishing, and measurement of the top 10 + social media networks (Facebook, Twitter, Google+, YouTube, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Tumblr, Instagram, Snapchat, Vine with more in the pipeline)
  • An integrated e-commerce enabled website 
  • Integrated e-commerce enabled Android, iOS and Windows apps
  • An email marketing and response measurement tool
  • A text messaging and response measurement tool
  • Training videos on how to use the package and how to improve your social media networking skills to sell products and services.

So, Enable Women gives you one dashboard to rule them all!

Imagine sending a new post to ALL of your marketing channels with one click on a single dashboard

OneClick will save you a lot of time and let you get on with what you really want to do.  And you will be able to measure everything in real time to make better marketing decisions.  

We are already 90% there and need your crowdfunding support to finish the OneClick package and go to market.  Heaps of perks for you starting from as little as $8.

Help crowdfund the transformation of our mobile app platform into OneClick dashboard for all your digital sales and marketing needs.  OneClick will let you control and measure ALL of your digital channels from one dashboard – from Android, Windows and iOS apps to websites, to the top ten social media networks plus you can run and measure email campaigns.  And sell your products and services from your apps and website.  OneClick will save you a huge amount of time and cost as well as improving your reach into, and knowledge of, social media marketing with our inbuilt training videos. 

How long will it take to get OneClick to market?

We are highly confident that we can have OneClick built and deployed to first customers within 3 months of achieving our fund raising goal.

Can you show me a version of OneClick now?

Yes!  Our founders have spent 2 and a half years researching and prototyping OneClick.  You can download and interact with a subset of OneClick, our Enable Women apps.  One dashboard controls all 3 app operating systems:

For Android: http://tinyurl.com/jch39yo

For Windows: http://tinyurl.com/h7oupvf

For Apple: http://tinyurl.com/jknnm28

A few of the pages from one of the well established OneClick apps:

So, download the Enable Women app for free and you can see our tech is real and we are well on our way to achieving the OneClick technology package.  Our app will keep you posted on the progress of this crowdfunding with regular updates.  We also publishes daily news relating to women and technology, business and the Gender Gap as this is an extra dimension to OneClick - our passion for equality for all.

What is the value of OneClick to customers?

To build the OneClick package from scratch would take around 18 months and over $1 Million.  So, the value of OneClick is:

  • Amazing technology that is affordable
  • Huge time savings since all social media, website, apps and email can be managed by one click publishing and measurement 
  • Improved reach to more members and customers via more digital channels
  • e-Commerce enabled website and apps to monetize your business
  • Training and support services provided by women for women and other smart people.

What will Enable Women sell OneClick for?

It will be available for an affordable monthly fee based on the number of features selected from as little as $8/month for a simple e-commerce enabled website to $88/month for an e-commerce enabled website + Android app + iOS apps + Windows app + email campaign manager + training videos + support + 10 social media network publishing tool + rich analytics and reports.

What will I get if I contribute to Enable Women?

There are lots of cool perks to give away from donating OneClick to women focused charities to woman who need instant and comprehensive digital sales and marketing tech package to start up their own businesses and organizations. You can get OneClick for yourself.  Or simply contribute and know you are helping us to help women all over the world to be more successful in their enterprises.

For as little as $8, go into the draw to win a free 3 year subscription to OneClick worth thousands of dollars.

What will we do with the money we raise?

Enable Women needs $88,888 to extend our app platform product which currently permits one click publishing and management of 3 apps and 3 social media networks (Facebook, Twitter and Google+) to include more social media networks, an integrated e-commerce enabled website and email marketing. Most of this money is required for software development ($50,000) and the rest of it will be used for social media and marketing support in preparation for the launch ($38,888).

Also, OneClick has been designed and will be built by women developers.  Hear about the development of its underpinning technology from Sukanya our lead software developer.


Who are some of your supporters and customers who want GET TECH! Package?

Some supporters who know a good thing when they see it:

Vernice Armour:  "Let's help the Enable Women team create a breakthrough and close the gender gap by putting OneClick in the hands of women. Get Gutsy...Get Oneclick".

Vernice Armour is a former United States Marine Corps officer who was the first African American female naval aviator in the Marine Corps and the first African American female combat pilot in the U.S. Armed Forces.


Lynn Cooper:  ‘‘The OneClick product is exactly what women need to be more successful in the digital age!  Please contribute to Enable Women’s crowdfunding campaign.’’

Lynn is the Founder and Chief Social Officer of Socially Ahead, a leading integrated marketing agency based in Washington, DC.  She is a specialist in online platforms and driving traffic through digital media.  Some of her clients include Procter & Gamble, Time Inc., Viacom, Hyundai, Verizon, Samsung, Diageo, AARP, Ford, McDonald’s & DRM-JPC Brands.


Some of the women who want to use the OneClick for their businesses:

AF Fulgence, an artist from Kangaroo Valley in New South Wales, Australia, talks about why she wants the OneClick tech package to be available to artists like her to allow more time to create.

affulgence.com.au


Brinana Ruelas, Singer, Songwriter and Voice Coach from Dallas, Texas, USA shares her thoughts on how the OneClick tech package could help her manage her digital marketing more simply.

briannaruelasmusic.com


Hear from Rebecca McPhee, a dietician operating in  Hertfordshire, UK & Carcassonne, France how the OneClick tech package could save her time so she can focus on her passion for nutritional education and motivation.

healthchange.com

Caroline Alexander, tech entrepreneur and Christian business woman based in Austin, Texas, USA talks about the advantages of  the OneClick tech package compared to the expensive tech she's tried in the past.

pray4.org


Laura Lee, a fashion entrepreneur, based in Washington DC, USA considers the OneClick tech package for the important job of reaching out to grow her business.

lauraleedesigns.com

Our Vision

We have decided to be an unusual business with a social mission to help women to be more successful by giving them tools to help them on this often tough journey.

Our vision is to provide unique, cutting-edge technology, know how and finance to enable women to achieve success on their own terms.  Together, we will reduce the gender gap and make the world a better and fairer place for all.

Hear more about this from our Chairman, Cynthia de Lorenzi:

What is the biggest challenge to achieving this?

The gender gap.

Is there still a gender gap? 

Yes, there are still substantial discrepancies between conditions for women and men - the gender gap. Sometimes referred to as the gender divide.

Globally, now:

  • Women earn up to 36% less than men (Australia: 18%, US 17.9%) (UN ILO, OECD)
  • Women only control a quarter of the world’s wealth (Boston Consulting Group)
  • Worldwide, women make up 22% of government (UNWomen)
  • 22% of senior management roles are held by women (GTIBR)
  • 31 million girls worldwide are still denied a primary education (UNESCO)
  • Women account for two thirds of the world’s illiterate people. (UNESCO)

If there was no gender gap the world would be a far safer, richer, and healthier place.  Humanity’s progress depends on it. (McKinsey Global Institute 2015)

How can the gender gap be closed?

By women accessing three important tools to close the gender gap – technology, know how and finance. (McKinsey Global Institute 2015)

What does Enable Women enable women to do?

Enable Women enables women to access tools for them to enhance their opportunities and successes and make the world a better and fairer place for all.  Enabling them to be effective and equal to men. These are the core offerings from Enable Women to enable women to overcome the gender gap and prosper.

Who is in the Enable Women Team?

We are a team of enthusiastic egalitarians, each with quite different skill sets that we apply to our mission to enable women to access tools for them to enhance their opportunities and successes and make the world a better and fairer place for all.

It's all about fairness for all.


Cynthia de Lorenzi is the Chairman and Co-Founder of Enable Women

Cynthia is a TEDx Women and international motivational speaker, expert interviewer and moderator, co-author and social media expert and consultant, producer, artist, and futurist who likes to refer to herself as a serial entrepreneur and social commentator on the status of women in our world and their impact on our culture and economy today.  Washington Business Journal selected her as one of the top 25 “Women Who Mean Business” in 2006, SmartCEO magazine awarded her the SmartCEO BRAVA award in 2009 and was awarded SmartCEO’s Circle of Excellence by her peers as well as recognized by Enterprising Women in 2010.  Her organization, Success in the City has been featured in the Business Section of the Washington Post, NPR, DC Modern Luxury Magazine and Washington’s Finest. Cynthia's passion for empowering others and the principle of paying-it-forward is a driving force for Enable Women.

Tony Overstead is the Chief Operations Officer and Co-Founder of Enable Women

BA Mil, Dip TSM, MCom UNSW

Tony is a technology and marketing specialist with deep experience in digital product design and development.  He is the founder and owner of a powerful technology platform that will power GET TECH! and GET FINANCE! for Enable Women. Tony has worked in senior technology and marketing roles with global banks, IT companies and government to create disruptive first mover products and services.


Colleen Overstead is the Editor for Enable Women

BSc, MCom UNSW

Colleen is a writer and editor who enjoys transforming complicated and disparate information into communications that people want to read.  Working with global businesses and advertising agencies for many years, Colleen creates messaging for marketing and education to a broad variety of audiences. She is passionate about equal opportunity and altruism. Colleen manages the general communications for Enable Women and compiles the library of resources addressing the gender gap.

Susan Ellis is the Finance Director - Compliance for Enable Women

MapSc Org Dev RMIT

Susan is highly experienced in corporate financial management, operations, information systems, internal control and audit. She has held senior management positions conducting financial, operational and compliance audits for companies throughout the world. Susan ensures all of Enable Women and Elev8 Network's business processes are compliant and efficient.

Christopher Mirto is the Social Media Manager for Enable Women

Christopher is a social media and digital communications analyst with experience in Sales and Marketing, specialising in the online space. He has experience in setting up and managing start-up online retailing businesses and has a passion for using social media to both engage and connect people. Christopher has a strong belief in fairness and the humanities, and ensures our message reaches a broad audience.

Sukanya Addanki is the Lead Software Developer for Enable Women

BTech Electronics and Communications Engineering, Sri Padmavati University

Sukanya is a Senior iOS developer, interviewer and team motivator at Ray Business Technologies. She provides expert guidance and training in iOS development to entry level freshers, which enables them to take up challenges and develop iOS apps across the world. Sukanya plays an important role in the development of the Enable Women mobile solution. As part of the Raybiztech family, she is a role model for everyone in terms of gender equality. Sukanya enthusiastically embraces the potential for women to use Enable Women to empower themselves in their own businesses and projects.


What is the Enable Women Foundation all about?

The foundation ELEV8 Network Limited will enable homeless women to access a purpose-built app called 'Streetmate'. 


This will connect women with each other, provide money from donors that can used to buy essential items, and provide connection to service providers for accommodation, advice and protection.  It’s all about building an action oriented network to get support, money and advice via one app, 24/7. Donate directly to ELEV8 for Streetmate through the Enable Women app available free in app stores.

For more information on this foundation please go to http://www.enablewomen.com/foundation.html

What is the Enable Women Timeline?

Other than donate, what can I do to help Enable Women?

Please share this will as many people as possible. Indiegogo has great tools for sharing.

How can I find out more about Enable Women?

See www.enablewomen.com and download the Enable Women app.

Why does the logo look like that?

As the Enable Women team enthusiastically works to invite everyone to help accelerate the decline of the gender gap, our logo was designed to represent our mission: to enable women to succeed in their enterprizes, making the world a better and fairer place for all.

Why 'Enable'?

‘Enable’ is used here in the most positive sense of the word. Sisters are doing it for themselves. Thank you Aretha, Annie and Dave.

Enable Women helps women develop and grow their own business or enterprize by supplying them with cutting edge key tools – technology, know how and finance.

Our vision for enabling takes into account the empowering opportunities of increasing self-determination and each person acting in their own authority.

This ‘8’ is made from the E and W of Enable Women. Eight can be seen as infinite. It loops back on itself to be never ending. A constant source of energy and life force. READ MORE...

Why Red?

This colour is associated with blood, energy, strength and passion. READ MORE...
 
Why Purple?

This colour is associated with power, wisdom, dignity and creativity. READ MORE...

Collectively, the Enable Women logo communicates a dynamic and passionate force for good and fairness for all.


THANK YOU FOR CARING.
story_txt:
What is OneClick?OneClick will be a unique Tech Package of digital sales and marketing tools.For the tech savvy, imagine WIX, Hootsuite, MailChimp, Google Analytics, Shopify and Goodbarber all rolled into one product, and then some - this is what OneClick will do.  Saving you a huge amount of time and money and letting you focus on what you would rather be doing.Maritza really nails it.For the not so tech savvy, the OneClick package will give you easy control of all your digital sales and marketing:

One click publishing, and measurement of the top 10 + social media networks (Facebook, Twitter, Google+, YouTube, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Tumblr, Instagram, Snapchat, Vine with more in the pipeline)
An integrated e-commerce enabled website 
Integrated e-commerce enabled Android, iOS and Windows apps
An email marketing and response measurement tool
A text messaging and response measurement tool
Training videos on how to use the package and how to improve your social media networking skills to sell products and services.



So, Enable Women gives you one dashboard to rule them all!




Imagine sending a new post to ALL of your marketing
channels with one click on a single dashboard 
OneClick will
save you a lot of time and let you get on with what you really want to do.  And you will be able to measure everything in
real time to make better marketing decisions.  
We are already 90% there and need your crowdfunding support to finish the OneClick package and go to market.  Heaps of
perks for you starting from as little as $8.Help
crowdfund the transformation of our mobile app platform into OneClick
dashboard for all your digital sales and marketing needs.  OneClick will let you control and measure ALL
of your digital channels from one dashboard – from Android, Windows and iOS
apps to websites, to the top ten social media networks plus you can run and
measure email campaigns.  And sell your products and services from your apps and website.  OneClick will
save you a huge amount of time and cost as well as improving your reach into,
and knowledge of, social media marketing with our inbuilt training videos. How long will it take to get OneClick to market?We are highly confident that we can have OneClick built and deployed to first customers within 3 months of achieving our fund raising goal.Can you show me a version of OneClick now?Yes!  Our founders have spent 2 and a half years researching and prototyping OneClick.  You can download and interact with a subset of OneClick, our Enable Women apps.  One dashboard controls all 3 app operating systems:For Android: http://tinyurl.com/jch39yoFor Windows: http://tinyurl.com/h7oupvfFor Apple: http://tinyurl.com/jknnm28A few of the pages from one of the well established OneClick apps:



So, download the Enable Women app for free and you can see our tech is real and we are well on our way to achieving the OneClick technology package.  Our app will keep you posted on the progress of this crowdfunding with regular updates.  We also publishes daily news relating to women and technology, business and the Gender Gap as this is an extra dimension to OneClick - our passion for equality for all.What is the value of OneClick to customers?To build the OneClick package from scratch would take around 18 months and over $1 Million.  So, the value of OneClick is:
Amazing technology that is affordable
Huge time savings since all social media, website, apps and email can be managed by one click publishing and measurement 
Improved reach to more members and customers via more digital channels
e-Commerce enabled website and apps to monetize your business
Training and support services provided by women for women and other smart people.
What will Enable Women sell OneClick for?It will be available for an affordable monthly fee based on the number of features selected from as little as $8/month for a simple e-commerce enabled website to $88/month for an e-commerce enabled website + Android app + iOS apps + Windows app + email campaign manager + training videos + support + 10 social media network publishing tool + rich analytics and reports.What will I get if I contribute to Enable Women?There are lots of cool perks to give away from donating OneClick to women focused charities to woman who need instant and comprehensive digital sales and marketing tech package to start up their own businesses and organizations. You can get OneClick for yourself.  Or simply contribute and know you are helping us to help women all over the world to be more successful in their enterprises.For as little as $8, go into the draw to win a free 3 year subscription to OneClick worth thousands of dollars.What will we do with the money we raise?Enable Women needs $88,888 to extend our app platform product which currently permits one click publishing and management of 3 apps and 3 social media networks (Facebook, Twitter and Google+) to include more social media networks, an integrated e-commerce enabled website and email marketing. Most of this money is required for software development ($50,000) and the rest of it will be used for social media and marketing support in preparation for the launch ($38,888).Also, OneClick has been designed and will be built by women developers.  Hear about the development of its underpinning technology from Sukanya our lead software developer.Who are some of your supporters and customers who want GET TECH! Package?Some supporters who know a good thing when they see it:
Vernice
Armour:  "Let's
help the Enable Women team create a breakthrough and close the gender gap by
putting OneClick in the hands of women. Get Gutsy...Get Oneclick".
Vernice Armour is a former United States Marine Corps officer who was the first African American female naval aviator in the Marine Corps and the first African American female combat pilot in the U.S. Armed Forces.
Lynn
Cooper:  ‘‘The
OneClick product is exactly what women need to be more successful in the
digital age!  Please contribute to Enable
Women’s crowdfunding campaign.’’

Lynn is the Founder and Chief Social
Officer of Socially Ahead, a leading integrated marketing agency based in
Washington, DC.  She is a specialist in online platforms and driving traffic through digital media.  Some of her clients include Procter & Gamble, Time Inc., Viacom, Hyundai, Verizon,
Samsung, Diageo, AARP, Ford, McDonald’s & DRM-JPC Brands.

Some of the women who want to use the OneClick for their businesses:

AF Fulgence, an artist from Kangaroo Valley in New South Wales, Australia, talks about why she wants the OneClick tech package to be available to artists like her to allow more time to create.

affulgence.com.au




Brinana Ruelas, Singer, Songwriter and Voice Coach from Dallas, Texas, USA shares her thoughts on how the OneClick tech package could help her manage her digital marketing more simply.

story:
You may ask…
Why a “Lemon Heart?”   


Why did we invent a table utensil ??    Because there was nothing available to squeeze the lemon into a glass with dignity and clean hands.  ...And wait ...then there was the issue with the seed.  Do I have to say more ? 

A “citrus squeezer” is not exactly “high tech” one might think, but I’ve often wondered why no one has invented an utensil that would eliminate having to make finger contact with sliced lemons / limes? For one, having to squeeze the juice with your fingers promotes contamination, and the desire to get up from your table and go wash your hands, all over the sake of simply wanting some lemon / lime juice in your drink or on your food (great for oysters as well!) .

Having searched the world over for something I could use to squeeze my lemon at the table, or buffet while eliminating falling seeds and messy fingers, and with confidence of not squirting anyone else with the juice. This left me wondering… The utensils I did find were both difficult to use, heavy and cumbersome to clean, basically not the specifics of what I had in mind, which is; 

Simple use (one hand)…Easy to clean…Inexpensive and durable. So, since I am called a 'problem solver', and don’t give up easily (just my nature) It had to be done!  And I did it with the help of a small, but smart group of engineers, using the best materials on earth and the smartest “squeezing” technique accommodating citrus slices of all kind. A wonderful, convenient, colorful, high quality, dishwasher safe, handy citrus squeezer! For convenience in restaurants, bars, catering, home kitchens, and also makes a unique marketing tool that can be personalized with your logo.   

I short words 

"It can be used by anyone, everywhere with ease and convenience"                                                                           

 

Here is how it works and been used efficiently and with style. 


.What We Need & What You Get

Our “LEMON HEART” is ready for mass production now and after extensive testing, but we need your help to afford the tooling and pay for the production here in the USA, this is what it is all about for me, knowing it’s typical that these kinds of goods are manufactured in CHINA and it’s not an option I’m willing to consider.  I am done with low quality products, and want it built in the USA !  

We can do it better in the USA.  

We have used a Polymer which is used in Spacecraft and for medical Equipment  (FDA approved) which is so tough that you can drive your car over it (we did) and it will not break. You can freeze it and use it without issues or you can leave it on your dashboard in the Florida sun and it will not be harmed. 

I have invested a substatial amount of my own money to develop, design and test the LEMON HEART to make it perfect and of help for everyone using it.  

We are going the INDIEGOGO way because we need a fast market penetration to avoid  copy cats from China using low quality Polymers resulting in disappointing products and damage the Lemon Heart experience.  We want it to be an All American Product, now, and in the future. 

For that  we need a multi cavity tool and good media representation, this being an estimated cost; 

- Tooling and initiation cost $47,000

- Targeted Marketing cost $30,000 

everything is ready to go we just have to be able to pay for it with your help.

The Impact

The “LEMON HEART” can be used as designed for squeezing lemon & lime slices or wedges as offered in any restaurant today without touching the fruit, without dropping the seed, and without a mess therefore eliminating the need of a plethora of napkins.  It has other uses as well, that we have discovered… like tea bags, picking up oysters on the half shell (after you’ve used it to squeeze some lemon onto your oyster), and also use as a tong for small finger food, imagination is limitless.  

           Lemons are healthy

              



Risks & Challenges

There is no risk for you not getting what we promise. 

The “Lemon Heart” is currently in limited production.  However, our current single cavity tool is producing at a very slow pace in our test facility. We have a “Patent Pending” and “LEMON HEART” is a Trademark.

Our goal is to make our citrus squeezer here in the USA, with high quality materials and product integrity and have this utensil available to everyone as soon as possible so we can ensure it to be an All American Product with opportunity to expand into other countries with confidence and the financial strength needed to do so.        We need YOUR  help. 


         

       Pick   > Rotate  > Squeeze                                                                             ENJOY



Other Ways You Can Help 

To Make This World A Better Place… 

It would make a difference to help spread the news about the LEMON HEART and its conveniences, since every citrus lover would appreciate! Take a look at the video (www.lemonhearts.com) and enjoy the fun music of the Lemon Squeezer Band, if you love it, please share it!   

A personal note…If you’re interested in contributing to a foundation created to assist families who have children in treatment battling cancer please check out The Tom Coughlin Jay Fund at  www.tcjayfund.org . Their mission is to ‘Be There’ for families in a critical time of need.

Our goal is to make our citrus squeezer here in the USA, with high quality materials and product integrity and have this utensil available to everyone as soon as possible so we can ensure it to be an All American Product with opportunity to expand into other countries with confidence and the financial strength needed to do so.        We need YOUR  help.                 Pick   > Rotate  > Squeeze                                                                             ENJOY
Other Ways You Can Help To Make This World A Better Place… 
It would make a difference to help spread the news about the LEMON HEART and its conveniences, since every citrus lover would appreciate! Take a look at the video (www.lemonhearts.com) and enjoy the fun music of the Lemon Squeezer Band, if you love it, please share it!   
A personal note…If you’re interested in contributing to a foundation created to assist families who have children in treatment battling cancer please check out The Tom Coughlin Jay Fund at  www.tcjayfund.org . Their mission is to ‘Be There’ for families in a critical time of need.

story:
Short Summary

The Quarry Event  is THE social hub in a social desert.  For decades this" business " corridor has been home to mostly long gone boarded up storefronts.  But we have a VISION: a vibrant and prosperous business community anchored by The Quarry Event Center!  Our MISSION: to bring South Shore together for good.... and good includes socially uplifting events of all kinds,  good food, and jobs for our community.
We are a woman and minority owned and operated business.  We all live in the neighborhood and embrace the concept of live-work-shop close to home.
The managing partners are a retired Chicago Public School teacher and a health care professional who believed in investing in the community. We have a small but dedicated team working with us.

What We Need & What You Get

We want to open a restaurant offering a fresh and creative menu at moderate prices,  Our relationship with the farmers of Pembroke, IL. is in place- so our produce, eggs, and meat will be farm fresh!
The space is ready!  We need the funds to furnish it with booths, tables, and chairs-purchase the inventory, and pay operating expenses. 
Our contributors will get  meals or event time and venue use depending on their contributions. Everyone will have their name on a plaque on our Contributors' Wall.

The Impact

In the year we have been open, we have brought this area back to life.  The word is out - come to jazz and dinner every Friday, a farmers market on Saturday, church on Sunday, meetings, birthdays, anniversaries,showers, and shows... you name it, its here.
But, our supporters are waiting-the interest and anticipation is at a high level for the restaurant to open.
This will bring more jobs to the area, and offer a dining experience that is not available anywhere in the area.

Risks & Challenges

This is a large place - utilities, maintenance and taxes are high, but we are confident that we will be and stay busy and profitable, especially with the restaurant open.  We are busy now, with public and private events booked  on several days every week. The demand is high and the support overwhelming for this venue.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you love South Shore, live in South Shore, grew up in South Shore, or just want to be part of this,  give what you can and spread the word!  But most of all visit us when you are in the South Shore area.
