story:
Universal Citizens Media Network is a free streaming platform where you can have your voice heard on your own mobile channel and terrestrial broadcast station.

 

Universal Citizens has a studio where you can film, edit, and take your video content to the next level. Whether you want the services of a camera crew to follow you around, edit your videos, or film you in the studio, we can help you create the kind of high quality content you want to match the quality of your message. Our studios are based in Orange County, California and with your support, we hope to expand our studios across the state and across the country to provide this premium service.

 

Universal Citizens has the resources to place you in front of your target audience. Like Youtube, your content will be broadcasted and accessed on the internet. With Universal Citizens, your presence doesn’t end there. Our premium service would allow all of your video, audio recordings, music videos, documentaries, and other contents to be seen by more than just an internet audience. Alongside our online broadcasting, our 24/7 television broadcast places your content in front of our large niche audiences.

 

Your voice is your legacy. Universal Citizens Media wants you to benefit from your message. We give the content creators the lion's share of the profits generated from the banner ads, promotional materials, and sponsorship revenue generated on our platform.

 

The UC Media Network streams purposeful conscious media worldwide while providing services for creatives that seek resources to make professional high quality videos. Content streamed on our platform is contributed by a grassroots community of Indie Artists, Citizen Journalists, & Producers that want to make a positive impact on culture & social change. With your support, funding will fortify our position to create a platform where subscribers & content creators can have their voices heard.



 

We are a tight-knit family company with family-centric ideals.  The impact that media has on culture, especially on developing youth, inspired my amazing mother, Alicia Hamilton (also known as Lady A) to create a place to share positive, informative, and inspirational media with like minded families and friends. My mother has a background in communications and technology, and has been serving in ministry alongside her husband Pastor Alexander Hamilton over twenty years.  Over time, the issues that were occurring in the community became more global in scope.  So, Lady A started building a platform to reach the world with messages of love, peace, truth and wisdom.  

 

My mother is very salient to how media is influencing culture in my generation. Upon my visit home from Argentina where I was studying Psychology and Spanish, my mother convinced me to stay and partner with her to bring a new age spin to her vision. With my charismatic personality and strategic intellect and her wisdom and experience, together we are hoping to build and strengthen the network. With your support we can spread our message to more like minded individuals and achieve our goals of creating a positive and conscious media platform to positively affect social change.

 

Citizen journalists and citizen producers are rising in numbers and telling the stories that are relative to their communities. Universal Citizens is a gathering place for bringing purposeful programming to uplift and educate communities while also entertaining them.

 

We believe that we can be the change we want to see in the world and the Universal Citizens Media Network platform is a means to make that contribution through media.  This is why your help is incredibly important to us. The paradigm shift is happening now and we seek to be part of the movement that gives strength to the individual and empowers community.

 

We know that media has the power to control the masses. Due to concerns of the strong impact that negative media has on culture, The Universal Citizens Media Network was created to provide an option for families to get programs with purposeful, conscientious themes. We are just beginning to see how violence, degradation, and the oppression portrayed in media have affected this generation.  The Universal Citizens Media family of contributors has all chosen to bring media that empowers, heals, and educates without the degrading and destructive images that have been placed in front of developing youth.

The advent of IPTV (Internet Protocol TV) technology has leveled the playing field in the media distribution game by providing a cost effective means for sharing media on a larger scale.  Small companies like ours are now on the playing field, and becoming serious competitors reaching mass audiences that were cost prohibitive prior to the Internet of things.  Audiences are also unplugging from traditional and more costly broadcast solutions like cable television.  IPTV provides options for audiences to get media that is less expensive, more engaging, interactive, over many devices, on demand and flexible for today’s busy lifestyles.  Television is not going away, but the market is being diluted by more options than ever before and advertisers are shifting spending to the IPTV digital networks thanks to trendsetting providers like; Google, YouTube, Hulu, Netflix, and Amazon, etc.   

 

We’ve been hard at work making this possible and have created several established websites (trn.tv and ucit.tv) and channels. Our mission is to consolidate them into one convenient umbrella site where you can steam and create content. We want you to hear your voice and the messages of others, in ways that vary from comedy, drama, faith-based, informative content and more. Watch and enjoy the positive content that we have on Universal Citizens Media. This website will be called UCmedia.net and will be available soon.

 

Lady A often says, "technology is the rocket ship but content is the fuel.” This rocket ship is in place, but we need to enhance the hardware and fuel to get to where we want to go. This will enable us to do the following:

 
  1. Create jobs: Our goal is to provide job opportunities for students and community members that will become our next producers, editors, technicians, engineers, channel managers, interns, and video crew members to help make every production successful!
  2. Present New Types of Programs: We will bring many new programs to share including; DIY (Do It Yourself) segments, films from independent artist, documentaries, talk shows, scripted shows, music videos and compositions. These programs will feature all different themes and concepts, including topics most media sources purposely withhold.
  3. Impacting the Community: Together we will make a positive impact on the world with media that is informative, entertaining, and fun. Below is a segment from one of upcoming shows, " UC Now."
 

Our media platform is set; however we seek to deliver our programs with excellence. Our campaign goal of $50k is the initial phase one funding that will go toward shoring up the Universal Citizens Media Network platform for anticipated growth.  Funding will be distributed as noted in the graph below; equipment, hardware, software, team support, content licensing, initial promotions, and our studio lease. We will continue to embellish and improve our media and broadcast quality.  Every dollar we receive will help us to improve our capabilities.  

 

We value and appreciate all contributions to our efforts and have created some cool perks that we hope you will enjoy. Our goal is to acknowledge every contributor that decides to become a part of our movement forward!

From gift bags, to World Peace T-shirts, to a VIP Invitation to our private launch party, we want to say our thanks in the best way we can.  Those acting early in their contribution can receive:

  1. Discounts on subscriptions to the exclusive/ad free content
  2. We recognize the power of having a digital footprint and those with a business or promotional need can receive their own green screen studio session. During this session we will record up to a two minute promotional video or a commercial. You can even use this time to make a digital holiday card for a loved one.
  3. Discounts on network advertising and promotional packages.
  4. Discounts on network time slots.
  5. Network VIP memberships.
  6. Network Premium membership.

For more details, please check out the Indiegogo Perks.

 

There are so many media options to choose from that garnering audience loyalty can be challenging. The Universal Citizens IPTV platform serves niche audiences on our niche networks to engage, serve and cater to our audience needs.  Fortunately, we’ve had a loyal following of journalists, producers, and consumers as the network was being built and we all look forward to turning on the switch.

More programs are being shot with high definition and 4K cameras today.  We must also be able to compete with the level of broadcast quality that audiences now expect. Our equipment acquisition will address the broadcast quality as well as securing the streaming technology to serve our growing audience.

More people are becoming familiar with getting media on their handheld devices and computers.  As the media paradigm shift evolves, audiences will continue to unplug from traditional media and get more of their programs on their device of choice.  We will continue to improve our multicast capabilities for mobile and handheld devices as well as cater to our audiences who enjoy watching programs on the television screen.

Please SHARE, SHARE, SHARE!  We are convinced that our observations are meaningful to more than just our team and we want to share what we have received with the world.  We understand that some may not be able to contribute hard earned cash, however every contribution as an investment in your future, our future, and the future of our world.  If you are unable to fund with money then please fund us with the power of your voice!  Share this campaign and at minimum please join as a free general audience member.

We can create a snowball effect to reach people worldwide! Indiegogo has a plethora of share tools.  PLEASE  TAKE ADVANTAGE!

With your support we can spread our message to more like minded individuals and achieve our goals of creating a positive and conscious media platform to positively affect social change. 
Citizen journalists and citizen producers are rising in numbers and telling the stories that are relative to their communities. Universal Citizens is a gathering place for bringing purposeful programming to uplift and educate communities while also entertaining them. We believe that we can be the change we want to see in the world and the Universal Citizens Media Network platform is a means to make that contribution through media.  This is why your help is incredibly important to us. The paradigm shift is happening now and we seek to be part of the movement that gives strength to the individual and empowers community. We know that media has the power to control the masses. Due to concerns of the strong impact that negative media has on culture, The Universal Citizens Media Network was created to provide an option for families to get programs with purposeful, conscientious themes. We are just beginning to see how violence, degradation, and the oppression portrayed in media have affected this generation.  The Universal Citizens Media family of contributors has all chosen to bring media that empowers, heals, and educates without the degrading and destructive images that have been placed in front of developing youth.
The advent of IPTV (Internet Protocol TV) technology has leveled the playing field in the media distribution game by providing a cost effective means for sharing media on a larger scale.  Small companies like ours are now on the playing field, and becoming serious competitors reaching mass audiences that were cost prohibitive prior to the Internet of things.  Audiences are also unplugging from traditional and more costly broadcast solutions like cable television.  IPTV provides options for audiences to get media that is less expensive, more engaging, interactive, over many devices, on demand and flexible for today’s busy lifestyles.  Television is not going away, but the market is being diluted by more options than ever before and advertisers are shifting spending to the IPTV digital networks thanks to trendsetting providers like; Google, YouTube, Hulu, Netflix, and Amazon, etc.    
We’ve been hard at work making this possible and have created several established websites (trn.tv and ucit.tv) and channels. Our mission is to consolidate them into one convenient umbrella site where you can steam and create content. We want you to hear your voice and the messages of others, in ways that vary from comedy, drama, faith-based, informative content and more. Watch and enjoy the positive content that we have on Universal Citizens Media. This website will be called UCmedia.net and will be available soon. 
Lady A often says, "technology is the rocket ship but content is the fuel.” This rocket ship is in place, but we need to enhance the hardware and fuel to get to where we want to go. This will enable us to do the following: 

Create jobs: Our goal is to provide job opportunities for students and community members that will become our next producers, editors, technicians, engineers, channel managers, interns, and video crew members to help make every production successful!

Present New Types of Programs: We will bring many new programs to share including; DIY (Do It Yourself) segments, films from independent artist, documentaries, talk shows, scripted shows, music videos and compositions. These programs will feature all different themes and concepts, including topics most media sources purposely withhold.

Impacting the Community: Together we will make a positive impact on the world with media that is informative, entertaining, and fun. Below is a segment from one of upcoming shows, " UC Now."

 Our media platform is set; however we seek to deliver our programs with excellence. Our campaign goal of $50k is the initial phase one funding that will go toward shoring up the Universal Citizens Media Network platform for anticipated growth.  Funding will be distributed as noted in the graph below; equipment, hardware, software, team support, content licensing, initial promotions, and our studio lease. We will continue to embellish and improve our media and broadcast quality.  Every dollar we receive will help us to improve our capabilities.   
We value and appreciate all contributions to our efforts and have created some cool perks that we hope you will enjoy. Our goal is to acknowledge every contributor that decides to become a part of our movement forward!
From gift bags, to World Peace T-shirts, to a VIP Invitation to our private launch party, we want to say our thanks in the best way we can.  Those acting early in their contribution can receive:

Discounts on subscriptions to the exclusive/ad free content
We recognize the power of having a digital footprint and those with a business or promotional need can receive their own green screen studio session. During this session we will record up to a two minute promotional video or a commercial. You can even use this time to make a digital holiday card for a loved one.
Discounts on network advertising and promotional packages.
Discounts on network time slots.
Network VIP memberships.
Network Premium membership.

For more details, please check out the Indiegogo Perks. 
There are so many media options to choose from that garnering audience loyalty can be challenging. The Universal Citizens IPTV platform serves niche audiences on our niche networks to engage, serve and cater to our audience needs.  Fortunately, we’ve had a loyal following of journalists, producers, and consumers as the network was being built and we all look forward to turning on the switch.
More programs are being shot with high definition and 4K cameras today.  We must also be able to compete with the level of broadcast quality that audiences now expect. Our equipment acquisition will address the broadcast quality as well as securing the streaming technology to serve our growing audience.
More people are becoming familiar with getting media on their handheld devices and computers.  As the media paradigm shift evolves, audiences will continue to unplug from traditional media and get more of their programs on their device of choice.  We will continue to improve our multicast capabilities for mobile and handheld devices as well as cater to our audiences who enjoy watching programs on the television screen.

Please SHARE, SHARE, SHARE!  We are convinced that our observations are meaningful to more than just our team and we want to share what we have received with the world.  We understand that some may not be able to contribute hard earned cash, however every contribution as an investment in your future, our future, and the future of our world.  If you are unable to fund with money then please fund us with the power of your voice!  Share this campaign and at minimum please join as a free general audience member.
We can create a snowball effect to reach people worldwide! Indiegogo has a plethora of share tools.  PLEASE  TAKE ADVANTAGE!

story:
We want to create the best dairy farm in Australia.

Hi, I’m Nick Haddow.

I am the founder of Bruny Island Cheese Co. and since 2003, we have been flying the flag, pushing the boundaries and raising the bar for artisan cheese in Australia.

But I have always had a dream to create our own dairy farm… a small, organic farm that runs a small herd of rare-breeds cows and produces the highest quality raw milk that will make our cheese even better. Earlier this year we found the perfect farm in Glen Huon, on the banks of the beautiful Huon River, and now I need your help to create the best dairy farm in Australia and turn the dream into a reality.

The Huon Valley was once a vibrant dairy region and was once home to dozens of small dairies. Sadly, today, they are all gone – unable to compete against the huge low-cost dairy farms that are now the standard in Australia. This dairy farm (the first to open in the Huon Valley in over half a century) will prove that small-scale, quality dairy farming can be viable in this country.

As a small business, this is a huge step for us, but a vital one. Your support will go toward directly towards buying the cows and building the dairy – the two major costs in establishing the farm.

 

Why we need your help & What’s in it for you.

In order to make this dream a reality, we need your support to first buy the cows ($110,000) and then build the dairy ($380,000).

 

The Cows

To produce enough milk, we need to purchase 55 milking cows. But not just any cows – we want to use old breeds of cows, like Brown Swiss and Australian Dairy Shorthorn. These are breeds that are considered commercially unviable these days but were once both prized for producing excellent quality milk for cheesemaking. We have found the cows (from two different farms in Victoria) but need to purchase them and transport them to Tasmania early next year. The cows are going to cost approximately $2000 a head.

 

The Dairy

The dairy had been designed and drawn up. A great deal of thought has gone into this building. Most dairies are designed for the comfort of humans as much as cows. They are also designed to be very labour-efficient (to save money). Big commercial dairies are massive operations that milk hundreds of cows automatically. Our dairy will be very different. We want our cows to get lots of human contact and get milked in a milking parlour that is quiet and not stressful. Because we are cheesemakers and not selling milk into the commodity market, we will be able to put the welfare of our animals before anything else: happy, healthy cows = great cheese. This dairy will be built from scratch and will come in around $380,000.

 

Why is this farm important?

It is widely agreed that the dairy industry has some major issues. Farmers are now at the mercy of global markets and pricing. Dairy farms are getting bigger and bigger and now resemble milk factories more than farms. In order to stay afloat in this environment, farmers are forced to apply more and more pressure to their animals and land. Some struggle to stay afloat and are forced to leave the industry.

Our farm will be very different, because it will operate outside of the regular dairy industry. It will be small and organic. It will use old breeds that are no longer considered viable but were once prized for the quality of their milk. It will put animal welfare ahead of profitability and sustainability ahead of efficiency. We are committed to raising our calves, not slaughtering them as is the common industry practice with bobby calves. The breeds we have chosen are excellent dual-purpose breeds and will be raised on the property for rose veal and beef, which will then be offered back to our customers to purchase.

Since 2003, Bruny Island Cheese Co has pushed the boundaries and helped raise the standard for artisan cheese in Australia. When I first started the business, I was told that I had a choice: I could make a difference, or I could be successful. Well, I reckon we have done both. We were the first producer of unpasteurised milk cheese, despite being told it would never happen, and we reinvented the way cheese is sold in Australia through our Cheese Club. We are now an award winning successful small business, located on an island off the south coast of Tasmania, and every day we try and make a difference to the way cheese is made, sold and eaten in Australia.

Now we want to set a new standard in dairy farming. And we want you to be a part of it.

Being part of this project means you will be supporting positive change in the dairy industry and being part of a viable, sustainable alternative.  You can become part of our ‘Farm Family’ community and not only receive some great rewards for your support but also regular updates from the farm and opportunities to get involved in it.

Once the dairy is up and running we will start work on building a new cheesery on the farm. This new cheesery will be dedicated to only making raw milk (unpasteurised) cheeses – making it the only place of its kind in Australia. This will allow us to expand our raw milk cheese production and to have a platform where we can develop our cheeses even more.

Together, we can do this.

Bruny Island Cheese Co is a team of passionate, determined people. Here are some of the key people that will be involved in this project:

Nick Haddow: Managing Director the founder of the business. Nick has two decades of experience in the dairy industry in Australia and overseas. He is also the author of Milk.Made. – his new book on cheese.

Jane Wilson: Project Manager. A native of Scotland, Jane now calls Bruny Island home and has been part of the business for the past three years. Jane has worked as a vet, organic vigneron, farmer and small business owner.

Halsey Swetzoff: Production Manager. Halsey is our amazing head cheesemaker. He learned his craft on some of the best farms in Vermont and Wisconsin and he and his partner Tess (who also works in the business) are now Bruny Island natives.

Tori Keygan: Tori looks after all our amazing customers and Cheese Club community and makes sure that they are not only getting great cheese but also are connected to what’s happening at Bruny Island Cheese Co.

YOU!: You care about where your food comes from and how it was produced. And you love great cheese!

Support us and become a member of our Farm Family

Everyone who pledges $100 or more will automatically become a special member of our Farm Family. This will get you regular special updates of what is happening on the farm, invitations to exclusive Farm Family events and tastings (including our annual Farm BBQ for all our great supporters) and special offers on our cheeses, books, hampers and produce through our online store and Cheese Club.

If you can’t help financially, there’s other ways to help.

If you can’t pledge any money, no worries, we get that sometimes it just isn’t possible. But if you still think that this project is important help us by spreading the word and make some noise about what we are trying to do. Let your networks know by using the Indiegogo sharing tools because chances are someone you know will also think this is a great project to support!

I really appreciate any help you can give us.

Thanks!

Nick
